resources.string:
Clover was updated

Clover was updated to v3.0.3

New in this version:
This is a dev build. See https://github.com/Adamantcheese/Clover/releases for details.

string-array.name: extra_abouts
string-array.item: Give a PayPal or Bitcoin donation to the Clover developer
View the source code and give feedback
Email developer for feedback and questions
